description:
Josuke and the others head to the bank with their lottery ticket, but the bank is suspicious if that ticket really belongs to them. Josuke insists that they bought the ticket, but they find out that someeone else`s name and phone number are written on the back of the ticket, and the bank clerk decides to call the number. Seeing that they can`t get out of this situation, Josuke takes action...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 「重ちー」の収穫[ハーヴェスト] その2
